snippet: BREMER--June Baker, June 6, 1927 - April 10, 2016. Beloved wife, mother and friend; Mom faced life with courage and determination, with a smile and laugh for all, and a glass of wine to soften the rough edges of life. Writer, golfer, bridge player and world traveler, but above all the best Mom in the world. We will toast you and Dad with love. Memorial Celebration in June. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BREMER--June Baker, June 6, 1927 - April 10, 2016. Writer, golfer, bridge player and world traveler, but above all the best Mom in the world. We will toast you and Dad with love. Memorial Celebration in June. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BREMER, JUNE BAKER
